name: Economic False Flag Identification
description: Detecting and exposing fabricated financial crises used to justify elite power grabs.

cards.title: Identifying Engineered Market Crashes
cards.description: Recognizing the warning signs of deliberate financial collapses.
bulletpoints: Tracking coordinated media narratives leading up to economic events.
Analyzing stock market anomalies and synchronized financial movements.
Identifying controlled demolitions of economies used for financial resets.

cards.title: Deconstructing Media Narratives
cards.description: Exposing propaganda designed to justify economic sabotage tactics.
bulletpoints: Breaking down language patterns in economic fear-mongering.
Identifying controlled experts used to shape public perception.
Tracking elite-controlled think tanks that influence policy decisions.

cards.title: Tracking Elite Financial Moves
cards.description: Monitoring how financial elites position themselves ahead of crises.
bulletpoints: Following insider trading patterns leading up to economic downturns.
Mapping hedge fund strategies that profit from controlled collapses.
Tracking central bank and corporate moves that preempt policy shifts.
